projects.title: Lestang Residence
projects.content: A responsive Web-App to rent an accomodation near Toulouse (France). You can either rent the whole house or a bedromm in the house. There is a full administrator interface too.
projects.stack: Rails, Ruby, PostgreSQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Stimulus, Stripe

projects.title: Vue3 Pokedex
projects.content: A Pokedex using Vue3, PokéAPI, Vite, Vue Router, Pinia, Vuetify. Goal: implement concept learned in the FrontendMasters' worshop to learn Vue 3 Fundamentals
projects.stack: Vue.js, PokéAPI, Vite, Vue Router, Pinia, Vuetify
